name: ARS Electronica #4 To Stray and To Return
description:
Video feedback piece for ARS Electronica 2021, Festival for Art, Technology, & Society
Garden NEW YORK CITY
8-12 Sept. 

In this piece I am exploring video feedback with Resolume Software and feeding it into a chain of video mixers with feedback. The mix creates unexpected results, dripping colors merging with geometric shapes.
